text: ni enneat kalpiccatallattateannum nanavareatu parannittilla. athava, “enre nathanum ninnalute nathanumaya allahuve matram valippett jivikkana”mennan nan parannat. nan avariluntayirunna kalattealam avarute ella karyannalkkum saksiyayirunnu nan. pinne ni enne tiriccuviliccappeal avarute niriksakan ni tanne ayirunnuvallea. ni sakala sangatikalkkum saksiyakunnu
